 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָצָה‎</span>] **verb** ==shut== (Arabic (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> and <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> IV. ***shut eyes***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: ***shut*** door); — 

**Qal** ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹצֶה עֵינָיו‎</span> [[Prov.16.30|Prov 16:30]] ***he that shuts his eyes*** ([[BDB#SS|SS]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עצּם‎</span> [[[Isa.29.10|Isa 29:10]]], which [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] reads).
